p: Bio sensors are devises capable of retrieving analytical information from the operational environment by utilizing biological components as part of the sensor. Biosensors use biological molecules, mainly enzyme, lipids etc as the recognition elements. Professor Hou [79], demonstrated a novel biosensor using LB technique to sense the mixtures of odorants in various environmental conditions (see Fig.Â 4). LB method has been successfully used to mimic artificial biomembrane and to have idea about their thermodynamic behaviour as well as desiging FRET based cholesterol sensor [170].
